page.title: 09BOMB DISPOSAL SCHOOL
page.content: The Defence Explosive Ordnance School is the only school in the British Isles that trains men from all three services in Bomb Disposal. It also trains students from Nato countries and sometimes from other foreign countries. Last year the school had students from 37 different nations. The students are taught the theory behind the working of explosive devices, how to render them safe, and how to identify some of the hundreds of devices they are likely to encounter in their work. They do a lot of practical work on real devices from which the explosives have been removed and replaced with a simulated explosion if they get it wrong.Classes in the school never contain more than fifteen students and generally are much less.The school has a Diving Pool next to the River Medway for teaching
